title: Blind Pick needs to go on OCE
body:
It's in the title

how is it possible that with all the changes made to ranked queue with people being able to find rolls and teams that we still only have blind pick for normal games

i understand playing more roles like support and i regularly fill and play support but how is it possible that when i actually want to play a particular role i have to gamble that a) im not gonna lag for 20 seconds when i join and every role will be called b) if i do call first smoeone else isnt just gonna lock it in and c) im not gonna be chat blocked for long enough to actually call the goddamn roll i want 

serriously this is awful i literally would rather play fill 1 in every 5 games and play the other 4 on something i want than have to get into a fight with toxic bronze scrubs every single select cuz we have 3 top and 2 jungle it literally kills my entire motivation to play this game

maybe if you spent a bit less time remodelling the client which literally nobody cares about you could figure out a way to make your game actually playable for people who just wanna go in and practice and dont even mind filling once in a while.

replies.body:
Can we remove blind pick and just have: Solo ranked (draft), flex ranked (draft) and normal (draft)?
Blind pick isn't even played competitively and blind pick just increases toxicity with everyone fighting for roles and people not taking the champ selection seriously.

They did back in 2014 called team builder but people hated it because everyone chose the positions THEY wanted no one wanted to support or go Jungle or Top everyone only Picked Mid and ADC .. It once took me 36 mins to find a game once... they scrapped it last year

> [{quoted}](name=Gordons Coming,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=PLKxTOIs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-14T06:57:52.738+0000)
>
> They did back in 2014 called team builder but people hated it because everyone chose the positions THEY wanted no one wanted to support or go Jungle or Top everyone only Picked Mid and ADC .. It once took me 36 mins to find a game once... they scrapped it last year

they could literally put the ranked queue position choice thing on the normals game blind and it would be fine

I can agree with this.

Being a support ONLY player, i find it frustration and quite stupid that i cannot go into a game as the role i want,without having arguments with my team before the game even starts.

I will happily go to another lane, but quite frankly i cannot CS properly due to medical conditions limiting my ability to click fast, making support the only viable choice for the health of my team.

Riot should really implement this asap.

I agree, unfortunately this is probably not going to happen at all. In the preseason patch, Riot actually removed draft pick for a number of other regions and are planning to phase it out completely - more info on this [here](http://www.riftherald.com/lol-patch-notes/2016/11/9/13574822/lol-normal-draft-queue-removed-why). Hopefully they come up with a solution that brings some of the better/fairer aspects of draft pick without splitting the queues.

Agreed, Blind pick is terrible. 

Normal draft would be great.

I just want the role choice. I dont really care if we get a pick and ban phase (the actual draft part).
It just sucks that people fight because someone can press "ctrl + V" first.
